attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My local PCT will not fund my facial hair removal, this unfair as a male to female transsexual, this is absolutely essential.

It has come to my attention that other PCT do fund this most important procedure for pre op transwomen.

This leads to a post code lottery for pre op transwomen requiring facial hair removal to succesfully live in society as women.

Why should I be punished for where I was born and where I live.

Please end this post code lottery

rejection.details: You need to re-draft your petition with a clear call-to-action as a title - not your name
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
